channel.title: 718 Money Pouch
channel.description:
Hey,
Well... I have tried everything possible to fix this problem with my money pouch. I cannot withdraw my money in my pouch. I have tried Running Scripts but I suppose I'm not running the correct one unless that's not how to fix it. If anyone can give me the Code for adding withdraw please do so, and you don't have to tell me where to add it.
Also, everytime I close my pouch and open back up it shows my money at 0gp. If I add more gp to it, it gives me my money back plus whatever I added. But if I reopen and close it, it will do the same thing. I have tried saving the money through player.java buy can't get it right lol.
If anybody can help me with this I will Rep++ and give you my vouch for being awesome helper. I need this and I cannot get it right...
I hope I get help :) pce

item.title: 718 Money Pouch
item.dc:creator: @Citellum Citellum
item.description:
@Citellum wrote:

Hey,

Well… I have tried everything possible to fix this problem with my money pouch. I cannot withdraw my money in my pouch. I have tried Running Scripts but I suppose I’m not running the correct one unless that’s not how to fix it. If anyone can give me the Code for adding withdraw please do so, and you don’t have to tell me where to add it.

Also, everytime I close my pouch and open back up it shows my money at 0gp. If I add more gp to it, it gives me my money back plus whatever I added. But if I reopen and close it, it will do the same thing. I have tried saving the money through player.java buy can’t get it right lol.

If anybody can help me with this I will Rep++ and give you my vouch for being awesome helper. I need this and I cannot get it right…

I hope I get help pce
